summary: The module implements ControlNet extensions for the Hunyuan diffusion transformer, offering a single‑control model that integrates attention processors and conditioning embeddings into the transformer’s forward pass, as well as a wrapper that combines multiple such ControlNets to provide several control signals simultaneously during denoising.
business_intent: Enable developers to enhance Hunyuan‑based diffusion pipelines with flexible, multi‑modal conditioning, allowing richer and more controllable image synthesis for creative applications, content generation platforms, and AI‑assisted design tools.
